name: Crunchtime (itch) (Fleischshake Games)
description:
STORY

Follow in this point and click adventure Jane's journey into the  game dev industry. Jane is a young junior developer and her greatest wish is to work on a AAA title. 

DISCLAIMER

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this game are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.

CONTROLS

The game is entirely played with the mouse

To report a bug or give some feedback, with [F12] you can open a simple feedback form. 

STATE OF THE GAME

The game is currently in the early alpha stages of development. I know there are still a lot of issues and bugs, only a couple starter riddles are working so far, and not all locations are finished. I currently try me best to work actively  on this project. 

SUPPORT ME

If you like the game you can support me here on itch.io or on

TWITTER | WEBSITE | KO-FI
